channel.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_CustomerPermission_Permission on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_User_Customer_CustomerPermission_Permission on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_CustomerPermission_Permission
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_CustomerPermission_Permission Service Datatype Description Each SoftLayer portal account is assigned a series of permissions that determine what access the user has to functions within the SoftLayer customer portal. This status is reflected in the SoftLayer_User_Customer_Status data type. Permissions differ from user status in that user status applies globally to the portal while user permissions are applied to specific portal functions. Local key A user permission's short name.
